name: TMI Leads Target Marketing Intelligence
overview:
TMI Leads provides commercial relocation sales leads to companies in over 30 markets in the US, Canada and the UK.

Commercial relocation leads have value for a variety of industries including: commercial moving companies, telecom equipment companies, office furniture companies, secuirty, computer network, cable & wiring. Other industries that can benefit from TMI’s commercial relocation leads are: janitorial services, sign companies, printing companies, plant design companies, contrators, document management, shelving, commercial real estate, office installation.

TMI’s telemarketing group calls through a very large database of businesses in a given city until they find a businesses that is mvoing. On average it takes between 70 and 90 phone calls to find a business relocation.

They collect all the information on the company inclusing company contact information, a contact person in a decision making capacity, email address if possible, the number of employees and the timeframe for the office moving.

Before TMI sends out the list of companies that are moving, they confirm the information to ensure quality. This gives them the ability to offer an industry high 90% accuracy guarantee. Also the service offered for office moving leads is a month to month service requiring no long term commitment from their customers.
